name: TrackMania United Forever
content:
files:
- update: http://files2.trackmaniaforever.com/TmUnitedForever_Update_2010-03-15_Setup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/TmUnitedForever/TmForeverLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: TmUnitedForeverSetup.exe
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    args: /silent
    description: Installing...
    executable: $DISC/TmUnitedForeverSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /silent
    description: Updating...
    executable: update
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
